boardgame.name: Advanced Heroquest
Herr des Schwertes
boardgame.description: Advanced HeroQuest is a revised and expanded version of the Milton Bradley HeroQuest game. The basic concept is the same: four heroes venture into a dungeon to fight monsters and gain treasure, but Advanced HeroQuest's rules are more detailed and complex._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The major additions and changes include:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; random dungeon generation system_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; modular game board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; ranged combat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; multiple colleges of magic and spell books_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; henchmen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; critical hits and fumbles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; fate points (the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;undo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; feature)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Games Workshop set Advanced HeroQuest in the Warhammer universe, presumably to foster sales of their miniatures. The campaign world is easy to ignore, however, should players rather keep things generic. Advanced HeroQuest also includes rules for using the characters and monsters from HeroQuest, should players want to do so._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is supplied with Skaven figures that make up the quest within the rulebook. The exact same Skaven, henchmen and hero miniatures were also included in Mighty Warriors, also by Games-Workshop._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The following White Dwarf issues contain adventure scenarios, spell lists, or other information for Advanced Heroquest:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #121 The Quest for Sonneklinge (scenario and Jade spell list)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #122 The Priests of Pleasure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #125 The Dark Beneath the World (scenario and Amethyst spell list)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #134 The Trollslayer's Oath_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #138 Henchmen (new followers for AHQ: the Dwarf Trollslayer, the Elf Wardancer, the Human Captain, and the Wizard's Apprentice -- this material is duplicated in Terror in the Dark)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #139 Treasure (This material is also duplicated in Terror in the Dark)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #145 The Eyes of Chaos (has rules for both AHQ and HQ)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #150 The Changing Faces of Tzeench_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Issue #159 Rivers of Blood_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Advanced HeroQuest: Paint Set has replacement heroes and additional minis._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Offers considered

The box is in excellent condition; no split corners and almost no wear. All miniatures are still unpainted in the sprues. Included are some articles from White Dwarf (pages were nicely ripped out of the magazine. All components in at least very good condition. NOTE: Missing 2.5 of the six doorways. Everything else is accounted for.

This copy is in excellent condition - most of the figures are still on the spruces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; most of the cardboard contents are unpunched... so obviously never played! This is also 100% complete... am selling because I own Warhammer Quest which is the better, so don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want this one any longer.
Complete. Expansion also available for sale, see separate listing. will do deal if bought together.

used but in very good condition. Complete except for the original two D10 dice which I replace with a new pair. Shipping $14.95 US. Will combine shipping. Will ship worldwide but task for a quote first.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! We recently acquired a large number of older, out-of-print games and are pleased to make them available to the BGG community. ADVANCED HEROQUEST: $129.95 Games Workshop (1989) * Initial inspection indicates that the game is 100%complete. (though it will be re-inspected and recounted prior to shipping). The box is acceptable and has some bowing and wear. The components are in very good+ condition - much better condition than the box. Pictures of the game are included below. SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Very good, like unplayed. Many parts still on sprues! Incomplete, missing the following:
-2 skaven -4 henchmen -5 yellow shields -1 dark grey shield Ships from US/97206
Box has wear and slight dishing. But components are complete and in good order. Aussies to pay by bank transfer. All others by Paypal. Thanks!

ADVANCED HEROQUEST - Games Workshop (1989) I studied the game like a maniac when I was in high school. I wanted so badly to play it, but my _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;friends_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; never had the same enthusiasm. Sadly, it has been sitting in my closet for many years, and I think I would rather let someone else get some use out of it. • The box is pretty square and VERY minorly damaged. • All pieces are accounted for including the rule book. • Rule book has yellow highlighting on it (my studies). • Game has NEVER been played. So sad. • Shipping to the Continental US only please. Asking Price: $80.00 US Shipping Costs: To Be Determined based on destination
Complete, some shelf wear. There are marks on three of the four sides of the box top. The box is not made from a very sturdy cardboard so there are a few creases too. See my pictures for more detail.

Complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; very good clean condition. All 36 figures (4 heroes, 12 henchmen, 20 skaven) are unpainted and include their stands. The only damage is on 2 figures (1 broken henchman weapon and 1 missing skaven tail) and the box has a crush on one corner and minor shelfwear around the edges. Includes rulebook, 6 upright doors, 3 large floor tiles, 7 small floor tiles, corridors, junctions, scenery, monster counters, fate counters, wound counters, 2 dice, etc. Reasonable offers will be considered. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs. Shipping Costs: UK £6, Europe £12, USA £17

Box lid has a rip and dips do to age (made of light cardboard) most minis are still on the brads, 2 hereos missing, one is painted but sword is broken. But extra white minis are included. almost all room tiles are unpunched. rule book in excellent condition.
No miniatures, otherwise complete. Would prefer to ship without box.

Partially unpunched. Most of the miniatures still on sprue. Checked contents against a list I found here on BGG. A few parts are missing. They are: Warrior figure Wizard figure 1 12-sided die (out of 2) 1 Stairs map-piece (out of 2) Of the 6 doorways, 2 are broken. All other contents are verified complete and still in good condition. The box, being of thin cardboard, has some compression and warping on top and bottom, but is structurally intact and has minimal scuffing at the corners.
Most components still unpunched/still on spruces. Box scuffed Shipping to Uk destination £7.50

Game has been in the attic for 15 years ! Looks like its been played a few times, although not all the counters have been punched. Figures are not painted. All the pieces are there and have been checked. Box shows some signs fo age, one corner is split but otherwise, given its age, its in good condition. Postage to the UK would be about £5, to the USA closer to £15. Thanks

Advanced Heroquest NEW ! complete and unpunched; most of the pieces are still on sprues (see picture); english edition, for others informations and photos please ask; the box is a bit worn only registered shipping available Advanced Heroquest NUOVO ! completo, tutti i pezzi sono ancora da staccare, tranne uno skaven, le basi e le porte; edizione inglese; per altre info e foto chiedete pure; la scatola è un po invecchiata si utilizzano solo spedizioni tracciabili
Super condition-played once Almost as new.

Overall, the game is in very good to good condition. Things to note: - some minis are painted (not a great paint job but not awful either) - there is an extra skaven mini, from Dark World: Village of Fear I think - the box is a bit bent (like all GW boxes of that era, the cardboard is too thin and flimsy) - the 6 plastic doors are broken, but all pieces are there and can be glued back together (I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t done it for fear of them breaking again during shipping) Apart from these issues the rest of the component are in great shape. BONUS: three White Dwarf articles, with a new quest, new characters, new spells and equipment. Contact me if you want pictures or more information, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be happy to answer. Thanks for looking!

Okay, a very nice set here, and there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s bonuses! This set is housed in the somewhat rare AHQ Paint Set box (this is the square GW box, like Kerrunch and Mighty Warriors). The square box just fits better, so I discarded the long box. Great game, and a good deal, here. Included as a bonus are all of the Terror in the Dark components, except for the rulebook!

English Language Games Workshop Edition. All components included and in excellent condition, except for one Skaven with a broken sword tip (included.) Sheets are all unmarked and extra copies of those and reference tables are included. Game box in very good condition, though there is some minor wear on the corners and edges as would be expected - great for a 20 year old game.
Game components complete and in very good condition. Shipping to UK destination £7
Unpunched Shipping Germany 6 Euro Shipping European Union 16 Euro Shipping World starting 29 Euro PayPal plus 5 Euro Money transfer via IBAN/BIC preferred
For user mcdrunk only — from chaosjenkins_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; My Wife and Jeep Need Surgery auction
Auction Item Reserved for User Bare2theBone

Ok, before you get too excited. The box is battered, like after 3 rounds with Mike Tyson. However the components are all great. ...and the really good news is that there is are nearly 2 full sets of components in the one box. one complete set for sure and maybe 3/4 of another set. So lots of Heroquest goodness :) The really bad news is that the manual is missing so I can only offer a print out of this. Not ideal I know. Although Feel free to ask questions. Can pick up from Twickenham area if you want. UK postage will likely be £7. cheers, James
Components are complete and in excellent condition. Hero figures are painted. Skaven figures are primed. Other miniatures are unpainted. Box has minor shelf wear.
Game components complete and in very good condition except that elf sword has broken and is missing. Many parts still on sprues. Shipping to UK destination £8
All miniatures and tiles in very good condition. Bokklet with some scratchs also box.
Private sale to Dustin2041.

Like new condition, punched, sorted and neatly bagged but never played. Minis still on sprues. Complete and nearly pristine. Box is gift-quality, looks like it just came off the store shelf. GW English edition.
Played once. All parts included in original box. Figures are not painted and in original condition. Includes full rules for Solo Play.
100% complete. I am also adding the Terror in the Dark expansion to this auction. Please ask for pictures.

Reserved for Ville Both Advanced Heroquest: Terror in the Dark and Advanced Heroquest Both boxes are there. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Terror in the Dark is complete except that 4 skaven miniatures where replaced with metal ones, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; All miniatures are very good painted. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Advanced Terror in the Dark is missing 6 counters. 1 rat counter of 4, 1 bat counter of 4, 2 gate counters of 8, 2 grave counters of 12. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Extras a lot of metal miniatures 40+. see picture _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Also not in the picture all dungeon quest miniatures accept one. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Most of the extra miniatures are metal and the paint can beremoved. Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC Questions just ask. Include two cd: YOU CAN PRINT THESE QUEST PACKS ON YOUR PRINTER THE HEROQUEST CD CONTAINS PICTURES OF ALL THE CARDS. QUEST BOOKS, TILES, ACC, AND SOME BOXES FROM THE FOLLOWING MILTON BRADLEY GAMES. AMERICAN SERIES 1/ HERO QUEST GAME SYSTEM 2/ QUEST PACK FOR THE ELF 3/ BARBARIAN QUEST PACK. 4/ RETURN OF THE WITCH LORD 5/ KELLAR_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S KEEP AUSTRALIAN /ENGLISH SERIES 1/ HERO QUEST 2/ WIZARDS OF MORCAR 3/ AGAINST THE ORG HORDE 4/ KELLAR_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S KEEP 5/ RETURN OF THE WITCH LORD 6/ DUNGEON DESIGN KIT 7/ THE DARK COMPANY (FROM HEROQUEST ADVANCE QUEST EDITION) GERMAN SERIES 1/ MORCARS MAGIER SPANISH SERIES 1/ DUNGEON DESIGN KIT ALSO ( FROM THE WHITE DWARF MAGAZINE) 1/ SOLO QUEST FOR THE BARBARIAN 2/ SOLO QUEST FOR THE WIZARD 3/ THE EYES OF CHAOS 4/ THE HALL OF DURRAG-DOL THESE CAN BE PLAYED ON YOUR COMPUTER. 5/ COMPUTER DOS VERSION OF HEROQUEST _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; QUEST FOR GLORY 1,2,3 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;4 (COMPUTER GAMES NOT TESTED)? HAVEN’T HAD CHANCE TO PLAY THEM.
Base game + Terror in the Dark expansion + extra figures + double dungeon tiles. Reserved sale for Bobloblah.
Some miniatures painted. Rulebook 3-hole punched. Willing to make a deal if you buy both this and the expansion, Terror in the Dark.
***Private listing for 6gunns77***

reserve for scout13 various parts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; pieces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Return of the Witch Lord Book - $7 Complete decks of all cards - 2 - $5 each Heroquest board - $5 Dragon Strike Board - $5 Metal Chaos Warrior - $2 Orc w Sword - 1 - $1 Sorceror_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s table - $4 for 1 Open Door -5 for $1 Door Stands - 16 for $2 Closed Doors - 5 for $2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

Eight AHQ adventures / articles from White Dwarf magazine. These are the original pages cut out from the magazines, NOT photocopies. They are in excellent condition. Issue #121 - The Quest for Sonneklinge (scenario and Jade Wizard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s spell book) Issue #122 - The Priests of Pleasure Issue #125 - The Dark Beneath the World (scenario and Amethyst Wizard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s spell book) Issue #134 - The Trollslayer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Oath Issue #139 - Treasure Issue #145 - The Eyes of Chaos Issue #150 - The Changing Faces of Tzeench Issue #159 - Rivers of Blood
Reserved for zotsman

All components in excellent condition. Rule book displaying some wear. Approx_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; 4 Henchman missing and some shields. Also 1 treasure map missing. Book displaying some minor shelf wear, on corner split and top of box slightly dished. Photos available on request. Will ship worldwide. Please contact for shipping costs.
I have a complete unpainted set of Adv HeroQuest. The game comes from a smoke free home and is ready to play! I ship from TX 78214. Any questions just ask!

Game appears to have been played once. Many of the pieces are still unpunched. Box is in great shape. Only minor issue is 2 of the 6 doors missing one hinge. Should be fixable... Has no effect on game play.
Complete game (only rules and one door missing). Painted heroes.

Game materials are not complete, some minis and doors are replaced by substitutes. All components show wear, box only light wear. Selfmade expansion included in form of a folder with more spellbooks and all necessary rules copied out of the rulebook. Shipping: Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Other options are available upon request.
Item is complete and very good condition overall. Figuers are still on the Spru and markers unpunched. Floor tiles have been seperated. Box has normal ware and indentation/rip in front.100% complete.

THE GAME IS STILL BRAND NEW, 100% UNPUNCHED !!! Very rare in such a pristine condition ! Light shelfwears on the box due to storage condition FREE SHIPPING TO EUROPE AND NORTH AMERICA !!! Any boardgames order from this list starting from: $250 and above (EU zone) $360 and above (rest of Europe) $500 and above (USA and Canada) will ship FOR FREE, including sturdy package and tracking number !!! Any other destination country will also get very special shipping prices, almost free, ask for details !!

Game is verified complete but has the following flaws: - Box top is moderately concaved and has a hole (1.25 inch x 0.5 inch wide) located upper right corner. - 1 Skaven figure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sword point broken off (about 2mm, tip included!). - 1 plastic door is off it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s hinge. - The Warlord_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Lair treasure map has a dog ear bottom right corner. - replacement 2XD12 dice included (1 red with white numbers, one frosty transclucent with black numbers). No original D12 dice. All other components not mentioned above are in excellent condition: counters, tiles have been neatly punched out, all minis unpainted and removed from sprues. Photos to be posted later or available upon request. Thanks.

German Edition. Complete. Played only for 3-4 times so the game is in very good condition and all complete. Hero models are painted, all other models are unpainted. Box cover splitted (der Deckel der Box ist an einer Kante eingerissen). Payment via bank transfer. Shipping is not included. Germany/Deutschland: 6 Euro versichert. I also ship to other countrys, please ask for shipping costs.
Missing 2 doors

100% complete. Some minor wear and bowing to the box. Cardboard is punched. All minis, except some of the shields, removed from sprues. The rule book is the only component not in perfect condition. It was taken apart, tabbed by section and placed in a 3 ring binder. (binder not included. Manual will be included in a large mailing envelope). The manual contains some highlighting but has not been written in. Includes photocopies of player sheets. Photos available on request. Item is from a Smoke Free, Pet Free home. UPS shipping will be added from 12189 or pick-up can be arranged.

Complete, un-played, mostly unpunched and in very good to excellent condition overall. Figures and doors are still on sprues, tokens and markers are unpunched and terrain is (mostly) unpunched. Box has good color, but wear, dishing and one box bottom split corner.. 6lbs. shipping from Pittsburgh, PA 15229. Free CONUS shipping if purchased together with my copy of Advanced Heroquest Terror in the Dark.

As far as I can tell it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s complete, and also includes three additional quests from magazines. Figures are painted to a low standard. One door hinge is broken. Otherwise in very good condition. Will ship to UK only. Postage and packing will be charged at cost.

Box dishing but in great shape for material and age. Game is complete EXCEPT missing original 2d12. I can pack in another (non-original) 2d12 or not at recipient_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s option. Only damage to components is two or three broken swords from skaven -- blades still packed in if you want to attempt repair . Many but not all minis still on sprues. All minis unpainted. Cardboard is punched. Pictures or further description of anything upon request; I was torn between listing this as Good or Very Good and elected to err on the conservative side. Buyer pays actual shipping from 02145 and may choose shipping method. May pickup locally in 02145 for cash (BGG will get its cut regardless).

Complete, though box has slight wear. Also with original Heroquest components all in the same box. Original Heroquest board however is missing. Nothing broken, cards in very good condition etc. contains the following items: 16 Orcs 12 Goblins 9 Henchmen 6 Fimir 3 Sergeants 10 Chaos 12 Heroes 16 Undead 12 Imperials 20 Skaven 1 Heroquest Quest Book 1 Heroquest Rule Book 1 Heroquest Advanced Quest - The Dark Company 1 Advanced Heroquest Rule Book 1 Heroquest DMs screen (worn on one fold) 4 Heroquest Adventurer cards 18 Corridors 6 short corridors 10 Corners 2 Stairs 5 T Junctions 14 Monster counters 1 Talisman 4 Wood Tables 2 Racks 2 Cupboards 4 Bookcases 10 Room Tiles 6 Plastic doors 35 Card Doors 42 Card Door bases 2 Fireplaces 2 demons 2 Crypts 2 Chairs 2 desks 1 Altar 1 Heroquest screen 24 Dungeon Counters 2 Weapons Racks 6 Treasure Chests 34 Wound markers 56 card counters for pits, secret doors, stairs, bridges etc 3 Character Sheet Pads 8 x 2 Heroquest creature cards 5 x 2 Heroquest Artifact cards 12 x 2 Heroquest Spell cards 25 x 2 Heroquest Treasure cards 14 x 2 Heroquest Equipment cards

Very good condition though box is squashed and corner damaged please see photos. All parts in very good condition rule book and extra pages included. Two extra tiles (probably from White dwarf magazine but I do not remember) included. All figures present some painted. 2 Henchman have damaged weapons, spare bases and shields included. All tiles and cards. Wheight is 1.3k, 43cm long, 29cm wide, 8cm deep, Postage liable to be excessive, I found and would recommend this: Royal Mail International Tracked _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Signed 3 to 5 working days delivery aim Up to £250 for loss or damage with Delivery Confirmation £17.15* Europe. £28 for South Africa (for comparison) with £25 insurance. I priced cheapest Landmark Global at £28, with only £25 insurance, they won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t let me book more insurance until I book the parcel. Which is very annoying. The asterix is because it is estimated. I can only get a confirmed price at the post office. If you are prepared to pay me an approximated postage I will refund any difference when they confirm.
